paper_abstract: The set covering problem (SCP) is a well-known combinatorial optimization problem. This paper presents a GRASP algorithm to solve a special SCP case known in the literature as the unicost set covering problem. The algorithm incorporates a local improvement procedure based on the heuristics to solve binary constraint satistiability problems (SAT). The quality of the proposed algorithm is tested on a set of reference instances, comparing the obtained results with those found in the literature. Our algorithm improves the best-known solutions for many of these instances. (c) 2005 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.
paper_title: A GRASP algorithm to solve the unicost set covering problem
